title: Mysql离线安装
content:
前言

因为部分原因，内网不能连上互联网，所以环境搭建只能使用离线安装的方法。在此记录一下mysql的5.7的离线安装。

MYSQL5.7版本

基础环境安装

首先将系统自带的mariadb删除

[root@localhost /]# rpm -qa |grep mariadb
mariadb-libs-5.5.56-2.el7.x86_64
[root@localhost /]# rpm -e --nodeps mariadb-libs-5.5.56-2.el7.x86_64
[root@localhost /]# rpm -qa |grep mariadb

查看是否安装libaio

[root@hadoop app]# rpm -qa|grep libaio
libaio-0.3.109-13.el7.x86_64

如果没有安装libaio需要去离线安装，步骤如下：

1、http://mirror.centos.org/centos/6/os/x86_64/Packages/ 进入网址

2、安装对应rpm

[root@localhost mysql]# rpm -ivh /opt/libaio-0.3.107-10.el6.i686.rpm  
warning: /opt/libaio-0.3.107-10.el6.i686.rpm: Header V3 RSA/SHA256 Signature, key ID c105b9de: NOKEY
Preparing...                          ################################# [100%]
  package libaio-0.3.109-13.el7.x86_64 (which is newer than libaio-0.3.107-10.el6.i686) is already installed
[root@localhost mysql]# rpm -qa |grep libaio
libaio-0.3.109-13.el7.x86_64

查看是否安装perl

如果不是最小化安装的centos系统，正常是会有perl的，如果没有，请按以下步骤安装。

1、利用可以连接外网的centos下载perl的rpm包，因为一个个依赖下载十分麻烦，所以还是需要有一台能连外网的机子来下载对应的包最后上传到服务器。

#注意这步操作需要 一台可以连外网的机子。
#这个是下载不安装，最后可以在/opt/perl下看到对应rpm包  
yum  install --downloadonly --downloaddir=/opt/perl  perl

2、将上面下载的包复制到服务器上进行安装。（我将文件放在/opt/perl路径下）

#进入到/opt/perl路径，安装perl
[root@localhost opt]# cd perl
[root@localhost perl]# rpm -ivh *.rpm

##################等待安装完成
warning: perl-5.16.3-294.el7_6.x86_64.rpm: Header V3 RSA/SHA256 Signature, key ID f4a80eb5: NOKEY

查看是否安装net-tool

#可以使用这个命令查看是否安装，若出现 not command 就是没有安装
netstat -apn |grep 80

下载地址：https://pkgs.org/download/net-tools

下载对应的rpm包上传至服务器

#输入安装命令,
rpm -ivh net-tools-2.0-0.24.20131004git.el7.x86_64.rpm

创建mysql用户及用户组

#创建用户组
groupadd mysql
#创建用户并设置对应用户组
useradd -g mysql mysql
#设置密码
passwd mysql

安装mysql

去官网下载对应rpm包上传至服务器

上传服务器并解压

#这里我将源码包放在/opt/mysql下
[root@localhost opt]# mkdir mysql
[root@localhost opt]# tar -xvf mysql-5.7.26-1.el7.x86_64.rpm-bundle.tar  /opt/mysql/*

按照顺序安装

#要是先麻烦 也可以该目录直接 rpm -ivh *.rpm
#我这里是指定安装这个4个。
[root@localhost mysql]# rpm -ivh mysql-community-common-5.7.26-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
[root@localhost mysql]# rpm -ivh mysql-community-libs-5.7.26-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
[root@localhost mysql]# rpm -ivh mysql-community-client-5.7.26-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
[root@localhost mysql]# rpm -ivh mysql-community-server-5.7.26-1.el7.x86_64.rpm

初始化数据库

#5.7虽然不推荐使用这个脚本初始化数据库，但是还是可以使用。  这里我将数据库数据放到/opt/mysql/data下。
[root@localhost opt]# mysql_install_db --datadir=/opt/mysql/data
#有这个提示，别担心，这已经初始化完成了。
2019-05-13 00:18:23 [WARNING] mysql_install_db is deprecated. Please consider switching to mysqld --initialize

#这里配置mysql用户组。
[root@localhost mysql]# chown -R mysql:mysql /opt/mysql/data

#启动mysql服务
[root@localhost mysql]# systemctl start mysqld.service

#查看MySQL服务状态
[root@localhost mysql]# systemctl status mysqld.service
● mysqld.service - MySQL Server
   Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/mysqld.service; enabled; vendor preset: disabled)
   Active: active (running) since Mon 2019-05-13 00:21:23 CST; 20s ago

           http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/en/using-systemd.html

  Process: 1595 ExecStartPre=/usr/bin/mysqld_pre_systemd (code=exited, status=0/SUCCESS)
 Main PID: 1671 (mysqld)
   CGroup: /system.slice/mysqld.service
           └─1671 /usr/sbin/mysqld --daemonize --pid-file=/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.pid

May 13 00:21:20 localhost.localdomain systemd[1]: Starting MySQL Server...
May 13 00:21:23 localhost.localdomain systemd[1]: Started MySQL Server.

修改mysql密码并开启远程访问

#查看mysql默认随机密码
[root@localhost mysql]# grep 'temporary password' /var/log/mysqld.log
#这里密码为uE%gonkuW4VA
2019-05-12T16:21:20.582741Z 1 [Note] A temporary password is generated for root@localhost: uE%gonkuW4VA
#进入MySQL修改密码
[root@localhost mysql]# mysql -uroot -puE%gonkuW4VA
#设置密码，因为mysql5.7有密码策略，所以不能设置简单的密码，这里建议是直接设置复杂密码。
mysql> set password=password('wkx199614.');
Query OK, 0 rows affected, 1 warning (0.00 sec)
#刷新
mysql> flush privileges;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)

####下面开始开启远程访问
mysql> update user set host='%' where user ='root';
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)
Rows matched: 1  Changed: 1  Warnings: 0
mysql> flush privileges;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)

注意事项

mysql5.7和5.6修改密码的方式不一样，由于字段名的改变，所以5.7修改密码的命令为：

mysql> use mysql;
Reading table information for completion of table and column names
You can turn off this feature to get a quicker startup with -A

Database changed
#密码的字段从password变成了authentication_string
mysql> select user,host,authentication_string from user;
+---------------+-----------+-------------------------------------------+
| user          | host      | authentication_string                     |
+---------------+-----------+-------------------------------------------+
| root          | %         | *F2DE15FBAC7024876F559D6FFBCF1D611D565421 |
| mysql.session | localhost | *THISISNOTAVALIDPASSWORDTHATCANBEUSEDHERE |
| mysql.sys     | localhost | *THISISNOTAVALIDPASSWORDTHATCANBEUSEDHERE |
+---------------+-----------+-------------------------------------------+
3 rows in set (0.00 sec)

#若不修改密码策略，可能会出现这个错误
mysql> update user set authentication_string=password('root') where user='root' and host='%';
ERROR 1819 (HY000): Your password does not satisfy the current policy requirements

#查看密码策略，修改密码策略。
mysql> SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'validate_password%'; 
+--------------------------------------+--------+
| Variable_name                        | Value  |
+--------------------------------------+--------+
| validate_password_check_user_name    | OFF    |
| validate_password_dictionary_file    |        |
| validate_password_length             | 8      |
| validate_password_mixed_case_count   | 1      |
| validate_password_number_count       | 1      |
| validate_password_policy             | MEDIUM |
| validate_password_special_char_count | 1      |
+--------------------------------------+--------+
7 rows in set (0.01 sec)


mysql>  set global validate_password_policy=LOW; 
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)
#将密码长度改成4
mysql> set global validate_password_length=4;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)
#刷新
mysql> flush privileges;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)
#查看是否修改成功
mysql> SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'validate_password%'; 
+--------------------------------------+-------+
| Variable_name                        | Value |
+--------------------------------------+-------+
| validate_password_check_user_name    | OFF   |
| validate_password_dictionary_file    |       |
| validate_password_length             | 4     |
| validate_password_mixed_case_count   | 1     |
| validate_password_number_count       | 1     |
| validate_password_policy             | LOW   |
| validate_password_special_char_count | 1     |
+--------------------------------------+-------+
7 rows in set (0.00 sec)

#修改密码
mysql> update user set authentication_string=password('root') where user='root' and host='%';
Query OK, 1 row affected, 1 warning (0.00 sec)
Rows matched: 1  Changed: 1  Warnings: 1
mysql> flush privileges;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)
